alert.note: Alert for Lake Mead National Recreation Area (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued March 08 at 2:34PM PST until March 10 at 10:00PM PST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 8 AM PST /9 AM MST/ TO 10 PM PST /11 PM MST/ THURSDAY... * WHAT...North winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...In Arizona, Lake Havasu and Fort Mohave, Northwest Deserts and Lake Mead National Recreation Area. In California, San Bernardino County-Upper Colorado River Valley. In Nevada, Lake Mead National Recreation Area. * WHEN...From 8 AM PST /9 AM MST/ to 10 PM PST /11 PM MST/ Thursday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. Dangerous boating conditions due to enhanced wave activity on areas lakes.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
